name: Susana Vinga
content: Susana Vinga homepage Susana Vinga Associate Professor Instituto Superior Técnico Dept. Computer Science and Engineering / Dept. Bioengineering INESC-ID R. Alves Redol 9, 1000-029 Lisboa, Portugal Tel. (+351) 213 100 384 Email: susanavinga@tecnico.ulisboa.pt Research interests Systems and Computational Biology, in particular dynamic modeling, control and optimization of biological networks, and the analysis of high-dimensional clinical data. Focus in model identification of biological systems, and also machine learning and biostatistics for personalized medicine. More information here. My short curriculum vitae. My Researcher ID profile, Google Citations, ORCID, and SCOPUS. I received the award Prémios Jovens Investigadores UTL/Deloitte e UTL/Caixa Geral de Depósitos 2010. In 2017 I was awarded the Prémio Científico da Universidade de Lisboa/Caixa Geral de Depósitos in the area of Computer Science and Engineering, and in 2022 I also was the recipient of this prize. I am among the top 2% of most-cited scientists worldwide according to the Stanford University and Elsevier ranking of 2023 and also of 2021, where I was also included in the career list. KDBIO/INESC-ID and IST organized RECOMB'2010 - Fourteenth International Conference on Research in Computational Molecular Biololgy, that was held in Lisbon in August 2010.
